text: We are seeking a Data Scientist to join a publicly traded environment services company for a full-time, direct hire position.
strong: While this position is remote capable, candidates must reside in OR be willing to relocate to the state of Arizona.
text.1: The Data Scientist drives internal data analytics projects and influence the roadmap and decision-making through presentation of data-based recommendations, using tools such as SQL, SAS, R, and Python.

li: Researches and resolves data inquiries and requests
li.1: Provides insights and serves as a subject matter expert for department data.
li.2: Documents requirements for data science and reporting projects.
li.3: Supports the development of standard data analyses, reports, and dashboards.
li.4: Collaborates with other teams to gather data and build relationships
li.5: Performs time-series analyses, hypothesis testing, and causal analyses to statistically assess relative impact and extract trends across all relevant functional areas
li.6: Transforms data into actionable insights and recommendations.

li: Bachelor's Degree in an analytical field (Mathematics, Economics, Statistics, Engineering). Master=E2=80=99s degree preferred.
li.1: 2 years of demonstrated knowledge of statistics and multivariate analytical techniques including multivariate regression, logistic regression, cluster analysis, design of experiments, machine learning, decision trees. Demonstrated knowledge in working with large databases to perform complex analysis
li.2: 2 years of demonstrated proficiency with quantitative tools including MS SQL, SAS, R, Python or similar statistical software.

text: is a leading provider of technology and staffing solutions for IT, Security, Engineering, and Interactive Design disciplines servicing startups to enterprise clients, nationally. We pride ourselves in the ability to introduce you to our intimate network of business and technology leaders =E2=80=93 bringing you opportunity coupled with personal growth, and professional development!
strong.1: Join us. Let us catapult your career!

i: Irvine Technology Corporation provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics.
